merchandises.name: HDInsight Mug
merchandises.description: This black mug is a perfect addition to any home office. It features the Azure HDInsight logo on the front. Microwave and dishwasher safe.
merchandises.prompt: High quality mug featuring Azure HDInsight logo

merchandises.name: HDInsight Hoodie
merchandises.description: This unisex hoodie is perfect for the chilly days. It features the Azure HDInsight logo on the front and a kangaroo pocket on the front. It is made of a soft, comfortable cotton blend. Machine washable.
merchandises.prompt: Warm and cosy hoodie with the Azure HDInsight logo

merchandises.name: SQL Database T-Shirt
merchandises.description: This black t-shirt is perfect for any occasion. It features the Azure SQL Database logo on the front. Machine washable.
merchandises.prompt: Stylish t-shirt with the Azure SQL Database logo

merchandises.name: SQL Database Sticker
merchandises.description: This soft vinyl sticker is perfect for any laptop or car. It features the Azure SQL Database logo. Waterproof.
merchandises.prompt: The perfect sticker to promote Azure SQL Database

merchandises.name: Cognitive Services Hat
merchandises.description: This adjustable baseball cap is perfect to stay in the shade. It features the Azure Cognitive Services logo. Machine washable.
merchandises.prompt: Show your support for Azure Cognitive Services with this stylish hat

merchandises.name: Cognitive Services Keychain
merchandises.description: This metal keychain is perfect for any set of keys. It features the Azure Cognitive Services logo. Durable and rustproof.
merchandises.prompt: A stylish keychain to show your support for Azure Cognitive Services

merchandises.name: Functions Mug
merchandises.description: This white mug is a perfect addition to any home office. It features the Azure Functions logo on the front. Microwave and dishwasher safe.
merchandises.prompt: High quality mug featuring Azure Functions logo

merchandises.name: Functions Shirt
merchandises.description: This soft and comfortable t-shirt is perfect for any occasion. It features the Azure Functions logo on the front. Machine washable.
merchandises.prompt: Comfortable t-shirt with the Azure Functions logo

merchandises.name: Blob Storage Hoodie
merchandises.description: This unisex hoodie is perfect for the chilly days. It features the Azure Blob Storage logo on the front and a kangaroo pocket on the front. It is made of a soft, comfortable cotton blend. Machine washable.
merchandises.prompt: Warm and cosy hoodie with the Azure Blob Storage logo

merchandises.name: Blob Storage Sticker
merchandises.description: This soft vinyl sticker is perfect for any laptop or car. It features the Azure Blob Storage logo. Waterproof.
merchandises.prompt: The perfect sticker for promoting Azure Blob Storage
